title: Lag
body: My internet and computer are great, no lag.In my past games people, have been talking about LoL lag.Now, I'm experiencing it to.Can you guys, fix this LoL lag.It gives me hard time playing, its not my internet or computer.And, my best friend is experiencing lag to.Her computer and internet is great as mine.Anyways, I need all the Help And Support.Please, don't make me upset having a hard time playing.

replies.body: Your network could be having problems specifically connecting to the game server and maintaining comms, even if your net works fine visiting other sites.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and get things fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
